name: smart-calendars-ai-create-events-using-ai
title: Smart Calendars AI: Create Events Using AI
description: Transform scheduling with AI-powered calendar management: Create events instantly by pasting text/emails/websites.
author: johannes_lohmeier

commands.name: create-calendar-event-from-url
commands.title: Create Calendar Event from URL
commands.subtitle: Paste URL to receive a calendar event
commands.description: Seamlessly convert URLs into calendar events. When you paste a URL containing event information, this feature extracts the relevant details and generates a calendar event. It's perfect for quickly adding webinars, online meetings, or any event linked online to your calendar, ensuring you never miss out on important events.

commands.name: create-calendar-event-from-text
commands.title: Create Calendar Event from Text
commands.subtitle: Paste text to receive a calendar event
commands.description: Transform any text into a calendar event with ease. Simply paste text containing event details, such as date, time, and location, and this feature will automatically create a calendar event for you. It's an efficient way to organize meetings and appointments directly from your clipboard, saving you time and ensuring you stay on top of your schedule.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
